snippet: The Scarlet Knights are ending on a dim note, but brighter days — at least financially — await the Big Ten.
abstract: Harvey Araton On College Football column says that Rutgers, deserving or not, stands to dramatically increase its football revenue after switching to the Big Ten in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights are ending on a dim note, but brighter days — at least financially — await the Big Ten.

headline.seo: Deserving or Not, Rutgers Emerges as a Winner
headline.main: Deserving or Not, Rutgers Emerges as a Winner
headline.print_headline: Deserving or Not, Rutgers Emerges as a Winner
